name: Lunar Rider - Jam Edition!
description:
You are the best space fighter pilot ever and the red enemies suck and want you dead!

Complete every level and defeat the enemies at every turn in order to prove once and for all that YOU are the undisputed greatest space fighter pilot ever!!!

CONTROLS:

Left Click - Shoot
Right Click  - Target
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Q/E or Slash/R-Shift - Switch Weapon
P - Pause game/Return to menu

This is the first few levels of a game that was created on a whim for the Game Off 2020 Jam! It was super fun to work on... didn't get to do everything we wanted to do, but keep an eye out for updates!
